replies.text: #CROOKEDHILLARY IS A BLATANT WARMONGER WHO LOVES CREATING DE*DLY INTERNATIONAL WARS! HILL*RY VOTED "YES" TO AUTHORIZE PRESIDENT GEORGE W. BUSH'S DE*DLY IRAQ WAR IN THE YEAR 2002 WHILE SHE WAS SERVING AS NEW YORK SENATOR THE UNITED STATES SENATE WHICH RESULTED IN THE DEATH OF 4,424 AMERICAN TROOPS IN IRAQ! CROOKED HILL*RY IS A BL**DY WARMONGER WITH HUMAN BL**D-STAINED HANDS! FREEDOM LOVING AMERICANS ARE #NOTWithHER BECAUSE WE ARE MUCH #StrongerWITHOUTHer! AND MUCH #SaferWITHOUTHer! YES WE ARE! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! WARMONGERHillary! #NEVERHILLARY! #TRUMP2016! #MakeAmericaGREATAgain! ☆☆☆☆☆DONALD 4 PRESIDENT☆☆☆☆☆

replies.author: Carlie
replies.text: Katrina... those troops sign up on their own knowing what's at stake. Can't blame anyone but themselves. Cry cry cry... don't sign up!
